A job for the Antiques Roadshow maybe? 

Nice find, though I wouldn't like to encounter the sharp end of one of those when leafing through old papers!

comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Vintage and Antique Knives, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment._content: Each beautiful and one looking quite ornate. A very special collection. Thanks so much for sharing and for adding it to the Vintage and Antique Knives group.
